title: "Artificial Intelligence knows when you feel lonely"
excerpt: "Emotion AI is a subset of artificial intelligence that measures, simulates and reacts to human emotions. Market research firm Gartner predicts that by 2022, your personal device will know more about your emotional state than your own family members."
